## KeyManager.rotateKey() method

Rotate the current key: the current key becomes previous, a new key becomes current. A grace-period timer is started; when it fires the previous key is cleared automatically.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rotateKey(gracePeriodMs: number): void;
```

</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->RotationInProgressError<!-- -->} if a rotation is already underway.
